title: How to Perform a Hurricanrana in Pro Wrestling

steps.title: Do this on someone bigger, heavier and taller than you.
steps.content: Do this on someone bigger, heavier and taller than you. Also make sure that the person that you are about to do a Hurricanrana at knows how to perform it.

steps.title: Run at the ropes and jump on them, like a Lionsault.
steps.content: Run at the ropes and jump on them, like a Lionsault.

steps.title: Jump and spin so your legs land on their shoulders and they are facing your crotch.
steps.content: Jump and spin so your legs land on their shoulders and they are facing your crotch.

steps.title: Spin to the side and lock your ankles around their neck.
steps.content: Spin to the side and lock your ankles around their neck. You should land stomach or chest first, and have your opponent fall back first.

steps.title: Lift them up to the top of their turnbuckle,.
steps.content: Lift them up to the top of their turnbuckle,.

steps.title: Stand on the middle rope and jump, so your sitting on their shoulders.
steps.content: Stand on the middle rope and jump, so your sitting on their shoulders.

steps.title: Pull backwards like a flip, and tuck in, so you don't hit them.
steps.content: Pull backwards like a flip, and tuck in, so you don't hit them. They should land back-first, and you should pose for more cheers!
